scripts.kill:8787: bash -lc 'pids=$(lsof -tiTCP:8787 -sTCP:LISTEN || true); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill -TERM $pids || true; sleep 1; pids2=$(lsof -tiTCP:8787 -sTCP:LISTEN || true); if [ -n "$pids2" ]; then kill -KILL $pids2 || true; fi; fi'
scripts.kill:port: bash -lc 'port=${PORT:-8787}; pids=$(lsof -tiTCP:$port -sTCP:LISTEN || true); if [ -n "$pids" ]; then kill -TERM $pids || true; sleep 1; pids2=$(lsof -tiTCP:$port -sTCP:LISTEN || true); if [ -n "$pids2" ]; then kill -KILL $pids2 || true; fi; fi'
scripts.test:all: bun run test:snapshot && bun run test:claude && bun run test:session && bun run test:api && bun run test:files
